vlive.korean: 굉장히 기쁘지만 싫은... I was happy but I hate it. 듣기 View video 모해 MOHAE : [미앤미] 블락비 '유권'편!(2)
vlive.english: I was happy but I hate it.

vlive.korean: [김민규 / 기쁘지만 난감한 알바생] 기분은 되게 좋았어요. It made me feel great. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 홍석천 사장님의 훈남 알바생 김민규 활용법 <지금 홍식당으로 알바갑니다> 4회
500일 이라서 굉장히 기쁘지만... I'm so happy because it's our 500th anniversary. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] 세븐틴 데뷔 500일 자축 안드로메다 방송
vlive.english: I'm so happy because it's our 500th anniversary.

vlive.korean: 여러분, 저희가 정말 기쁘지만 이럴 시간이 없어요. Although we're super happy, we don't have time for this. 듣기 View video ASTRO : ASTRO 'Autumn story' COUNTDOWN LIVE (아스트로 컴백 카운트다운)
vlive.english: Although we're super happy, we don't have time for this.

vlive.korean: 저희도 기쁘지만 버디 분들도 굉장히 뿌듯해하실 것 같아서 저희가 너무 좋네요. We feel good that Buddy would be so happy right now. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 버디 고마워😙
vlive.english: We feel good that Buddy would be so happy right now.

examples.korean: Schumacher said that he is glad to be retired, but at the same time, did not rule out a comeback. 발음듣기 슈마허는 자신이 은퇴해서 기쁘지만 동시에 복귀를 배제하지는 않는다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Schumacher said that he is glad to be retired, but at the same time, did not rule out a comeback. 발음

examples.korean: Thanks, Karen. I'm happy to get the job, but relocating will be hard--I have so many friends here. 발음듣기 고마워요, 카렌. 그 일을 맡게 된 건 기쁘지만, 이사하는 것 때문에 걱정이에요. 여긴 친구들도 많이 있는데. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Thanks, Karen. I'm happy to get the job, but relocating will be hard--I have so many friends here. 발음

examples.korean: They are happy that Yong won the lottery, but said that education is still important. 발음듣기 그들은 용이 복권에 당첨되어 기쁘지만, 그들은 교육은 여전히 중요하다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: They are happy that Yong won the lottery, but said that education is still important. 발음

examples.korean: On the other hand a group of doctors aren’t pleased. 발음듣기 반면에, 기쁘지만은 않은 의사들도 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: On the other hand a group of doctors aren’t pleased. 발음

examples.korean: Yet if you go plugging your iPod into a Gatorade soaked vegetable the results will be less than pleasing. 발음듣기 하지만 만약 여러분이 아이팟을 야채에 담긴 게토레이트에 플러그를 꽂았다면 그 결과는 기쁘지만은 않을 것이다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Yet if you go plugging your iPod into a Gatorade soaked vegetable the results will be less than pleasing. 발음
